Name: HARD TAPES
About the game: Do you deal with toxic people every day?... Well, you are not the only one. In this little game the characters will be those people who treat you like garbage at work in the family and on the street and even at parties and the list goes on. You will make the decision whether to forgive those bad people who do not value others or value their luck. First person shooter Psychological horror, where you will find traps, monsters, normal people and weapons, The game will be varied, you will not feel anything repetitive, there will be moments where fighting will be an option and others where running will be the only option, The villain Bill will be in charge of teaching you the tutorial and will tell you the description and history of each character.
